name: Oscilloscope (HnTRgg)
description:
Oscilloscope it's a short horror game with experimental gameplay. Walkthrouth takes around 15 minutes.

Story:

You are the driver of a rover that was sent to a distant moon with very unusual artifacts. These artifacts have very useful properties, your mission is to find them. Nobody knows who you can meet. Good Luck.

Gamelpay:

You can only see through the oscilloscope screen, which gives you a 360-degree view using sonar. But you can hear every sound around you.
